title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 425.6 - State reimbursement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 425.6 - State reimbursement

State Regulations
(a) There shall be paid, to each social
services district which provides day services in accordance with department
regulations, the amount of Federal funds, if any, properly received or to be
received on account of such expenditures and, subject to the availability of

State funds, 50 per centum of allowable expenditures for day services and its
administration after first deducting therefrom any Federal funds properly
received or to be received on account thereof, and the amount of any fees paid
to the local social services official for day services. (b) Charges to local social services
districts for day services may include expenditures for compensation of
employees in connection with the furnishing of day services, including but not
limited to costs incurred for pensions, Federal old age and survivors insurance
and health insurance for such employees, training programs for personnel, operation, maintenance and service costs, and such other expenditures as
equipment costs, depreciation, and charges and rental values. It shall not
include expenditures for capital costs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
425.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
